name: ergo-blockchain-mcp
description: -An MCP server to integrate Ergo Blockchain Node and Explorer APIs for checking address balances, analyzing transactions, viewing transaction history, performing forensic analysis of addresses, searching for tokens, and monitoring network status.

prompts.name: Running the MCP Server as a Module
prompts.description: Run the server using Python module command.
prompts.text:
```bash
# Make sure your virtual environment is activated:
# Using the full path (recommended):
/path/to/your/project/.venv/bin/python -m ergo_explorer

# Or with activated virtual environment:
python -m ergo_explorer
```

prompts.name: Running Tests
prompts.text:
```bash
# Run all tests
python -m pytest

# Run specific test files
python -m pytest tests/unit/test_address_tools.py
```

SERVER_HOST.description: Host to bind the server to (default: 0.0.0.0)
SERVER_HOST.title: SERVER_HOST

SERVER_PORT.description: Port to run the server on (default: 3001)
SERVER_PORT.title: SERVER_PORT

ERGO_NODE_API.description: URL of the Ergo node API (for node-specific features)
ERGO_NODE_API.title: ERGO_NODE_API

ERGO_NODE_API_KEY.description: API key for the Ergo node (if required)
ERGO_NODE_API_KEY.title: ERGO_NODE_API_KEY
